myapp-prod_api.description: Main API service - Prod (same repo as dev)

myapp-prod_web.description: Web frontend - Prod (same repo as dev)

description: Copy this file to whitelist_service.json in the project root. Add service names to 'services' array and map each to a GitLab project ID in 'serviceMapping' for tag fetching. Services can share the same GitLab project ID.
